title: Econ-Corporate Strategy
description: Applies microeconomic and macroeconomic theory to the development of modern corporate strategy, including organizational boundaries, market structure and competition, industry analysis, and competitive advantage.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECON 3110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECON 6100 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
